control_attributes.control_description: The information system, when [Assignment: organization-defined conditions] are detected, enters a safe mode of operation with [Assignment: organization-defined restrictions of safe mode of operation].
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system implements replay-resistant authentication mechanisms for network access to non-privileged accounts.

Control Statement: The information system, when [Assignment: organization-defined conditions] are detected, enters a safe mode of operation with [Assignment: organization-defined restrictions of safe mode of operation].
